title: MAXIMUM LEBROKEN's TRUE FIRST LOVE. THE MAN THAT TURNED ME EVIL MUAHAHA
body:
#MOST GDERS WONDER... HAS MLB EVER HAD A BF? 

I will confess to GD my darkest TRUE love story.

The story of love that set me spiralling into neurosurgery in the first place.

The love that inspired me to go into Muay Thai and BJJ and hack.

I will confess this story to you all. Of the long held secret of my one true first love.

BUT I REQUIRE HYPE. SO I WILL WAIT UNTIL TOMORROW TO REVEAL THE STORY.

YES THIS IS REAL.

NO THIS IS NOT A JOKE.

THIS IS NOT FAKE.

THIS IS NOT A FALSE ALARM.

I WILL REVEAL IT TOMORROW. 

MY DARKEST LOVE.

Never before heard of or seen. A legitimate first reveal on the first man on my life. A guy who had such a profound impact I still feel itm
